greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors of n that are also contained in the decimal representation of n.
comment: a(A155005(n)) = n and a(m) < n for m < A155005(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 18 2009
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a121041 n = length $ filter (\d -> n `mod` d == 0
(PARI) substr(a,b)=a=digits(a); b=digits(b); for(i=0,#a-#b, for(j=1,#b, if(a[i+j]!=b[j], next(2))); return(1)); 0
a(n)=sumdiv(n,d, substr(n,d)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 31 2016
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 21 2006
